A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
There are a lot of things I could nit pick... from no Snoke back story to the Rose/Finn casino dead end sideplot.  The one thing I can't forgive is the direction Luke's character went.  It seems like a completely different character.  The Jedi who brought Vader back to the light would not runaway. 

 A few good things I'll mention are Rey\, Kylo and the guards in Snoke's throne room....that was awesome and the light speed kamikaze scene.  

Over all very disappointing.
